title: What can I do if my phone cannot be detected by other Bluetooth devices?
answer:
l   Your phone may not be set to visible.

After you enable Bluetooth, touch **Bluetooth** to display the Bluetooth settings screen. Touch your phone's Bluetooth name to set it to visible.

l   The Bluetooth visibility may have timed out.

Re-enable the Bluetooth visibility or change the timeout period. On the Bluetooth settings screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204204029617001.png) > **Visibility timeout** to select a period and enable Bluetooth visibility.

l   Your phone may not be within the working range of Bluetooth.

Make sure your phone is within 10 m of other Bluetooth devices.
